#!/bin/ash
# Arclight Forge Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

PROJECT=Arclight-Forge

if [ -n "${DL_PATH}" ]; then
    echo -e "Using supplied download url: ${DL_PATH}"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=${DL_PATH}
else
    echo -e "Downloading Arclight Forge version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=https://github.com/IzzelAliz/Arclight/releases/download/${MINECRAFT_VERSION}/arclight-forge-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}-latest.jar
fi

cd /mnt/server

curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}

if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading server.properties"
    curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/minecraft/java/server.properties
fi
